projects.title: Quiz Game
projects.description: My first complete end-to-end Python backend project: a quiz and exam platform for Class 11–12 students in India, featuring a large, difficulty-segmented question bank and support for multi-subject blended exams. Future improvements include new features and a refined UI.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js to showcase my projects and skills. Features a dynamic design, music system theme, and interactive elements.

projects.title: Visual NN
projects.description: Building neural networks from scratch using only mathematics, NumPy, and Pandas—no ML/DL libraries. Includes a simple UI to help users visualize and better understand complex neural network behavior.

projects.title: ML Drift Monitoring & Auto-Retraining System
projects.description: A production-style ML service that detects data & prediction drift after deployment and decides when retraining is required.
